About The Flour Shop Bakery&Pizza The Flour Shop Bakery&Pizza is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1727 W John Beers Rd in Stevensville, MI . The Flour Shop Bakery&Pizza has been described as an Exceptional Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 7 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Pizza, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
